marklogic.body:
Speaking of the Planets.......well I guess Pluto's not a planet anymore.....but is......and the surface of is much much hotter than the surface of Mercury.....even though Mercury is much much closer to the sun.
Did you know that, swampdoggie?
Did you know that the reason is so much hotter than Mercury is Global Warming/Greenhouse EffectÂ gone wild. The Venusian atmosphere traps Heat from the sun and causes surface temperatures to soar.
Thats one of theÂ concerns ClimatologistsÂ have for earth. Man isÂ making the sameÂ Greenhouse Gases that turned Venus into a heIIhole.
Weird weather we've having.
